name: Collect Quality Related Documents
description: Please complete the attached form, sign and upload as pdf when completed

name: Site QA Review of SCD
description: Please review the provided Supply Chain Declaration (SCD) and complete the form for the Requested Vendor and for the associated Supply Chain Partner(s). Request Assessments and /or Quality Agreement (updates) wherever required to meet standards of GROUP-99350. Please also request creation of SAP Vendor numbers for SC Partners that are not yet in SAP

name: Review and assignment of Assessments by GQCSC
description:
Please review requests raised by Site QA against the SCD provided, requirements per Group-99350 and status in TrackWise. 
If you disagree with Site QA requests, you can change accordingly, but alignment and clarification with Site QA should be assured before applying changes.
All documents uploaded for completion by requested vendor and /or supply chain partner should be appropriately pre-populated.
Assignment of tasks will be done in a separate step.

name: Review and assignment of QAA/SCL by GQCSC
description:
Please review requests raised by Site QA against the SCD provided, requirements per Group-99350 and status in DMS and on the QAA dynamic plan. 
If you disagree with Site QA requests, you can change accordingly, but alignment and clarification with Site QA should be assured before applying changes.
All documents uploaded for completion by requested vendor and /or supply chain partner should be appropriately pre-populated.
Assignment of tasks will be done in a separate step.

name: Assign Assessment Tasks
description: For proper assignment please use information included in the “Site Info” Section (identification of site address) and the “Assessment for VSCI Vendor” Section (type of assessment needed)

name: Assign QAA Tasks
description: For proper assignment please use information included in the “Site Info” Section (identification of site address) and the “Assessment for VSCI Vendor” Section (type of agreement needed)

name: Download and Upload Form Creation For Supplier
Collect Assessment and QAA documents
description:
In each section you will find the documents to be completed. Assure that they are downloaded, processed and signed (Wet inc or e-signature) by qualified and authorized colleagues for the corresponding company / site.
Do not delete any documents you have downloaded.
If there are questions related to completion of the request, please reach out to us using the “Request Info” functionality provided”
Upload the final document as pdf.
